meanings.sent1: The elephant's skin was the wrinkliest of all the animals at the zoo.
meanings.sent2: Grandma's hands were the wrinkliest in the family.
meanings.sent3: The wrinkliest dog at the park always wins the 'cutest wrinkly face' contest.
meanings.sent4: The old map was the wrinkliest, showing the most traveled paths over time.
meanings.sent5: The wrinkliest tree in the forest looked like it held the secrets of centuries within its bark.

meanings.sent1: Out of all the clothes, the wrinkliest shirt needed ironing the most.
meanings.sent2: The wrinkliest blanket on the bed was the coziest.
meanings.sent3: The wrinkliest potato in the bag made everyone laugh at dinner.
meanings.sent4: The wrinkliest road on the map led to the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The wrinkliest cloud in the sky resembled a fluffy, cotton candy mountain.
